entity_types.name: module
entity_types.description: A software module within the manufacturing system.

entity_types.name: parameter
entity_types.description: Configuration settings or options within a module.

entity_types.name: session
entity_types.description: A specific interface or configuration screen within the software.

entity_types.name: process
entity_types.description: A series of steps or operations performed within the system.

entity_types.name: function
entity_types.description: Specific capabilities or features provided by the software.

relation_types.name: contains
relation_types.description: Indicates that one entity includes another within its structure.

relation_types.name: uses
relation_types.description: Indicates that one entity utilizes another for a specific purpose.

relation_types.name: depends_on
relation_types.description: Indicates that one entity relies on another to function properly.
